cookies.js Script¶

getCookie(name)¶

Used to get the string data stored in a specifically named cookie

Arguments:
  • name (string) – the name used as a key to identify the cookie requested
Returns:

string – cookieData - the data string stored under the cookie of name ‘name’
setCookie(name, data, time)¶

Used to set a cookie with particular data

Arguments:
  • name (string) – the name used as a key to identify the cookie to be set
  • data (string|number) – the data value to associate with the cookie
  • time (number) – the number of milliseconds for which the cookie should be retained before expiring
refreshCookies(time)¶

Used to set the expiry time to a single value for all cookies present in the document

Arguments:
  • time (number) – the number of milliseconds for which all cookies should be retained before expiring
convertNameToDuration(timeString)¶

Used to convert string-formatted values for the “cookieDuration” cookie to number of milliseconds

Arguments:
  • timeString (string) – the indicative string (‘minute’,’hour’,’day’,’week’,’month’ or ‘year’) to convert
Returns:

number – timeMilliseconds - the number of milliseconds represented by the given string. Defaults to 0 if the string is not one of the above recognised strings
setCookieDuration()¶

Used to reset the expiry time on the “cookieDuration” cookie, or set the cookie to the default value (‘hour’) if it does not exist

getCookieDuration()¶

Convenience function used to get the numerical value represented in the “cookieDuration” cookie

Returns:number – timeMilliseconds - the number of milliseconds represented by the string stored in the in the “cookieDuration” cookie
